name: Red Planet Mission
description:
Your mission, should you choose to accept it, is to land your extremely flammable spaceship on the mysterious red planet.

Control your descent using the arrow keys. Avoid colliding with the planet's uneven surface, and manage your speed for the final landing!

This game is a basic PICO-8 project based on "Lander" from Dylan Bennett's Game Development with PICO-8.
